LanguageData.VPE_EltexMeteor.questDescriptionRules.ru: questDescription->A large meteorite has struck ground nearby. It has left behind a lump of eltex. Eltex can be used to create psyfocus-enhancing gear, or sold to the Empire to gain honor. You can send a mining party to retrieve it, but chances are if you wait long enough, someone else will lay claim to it.
LanguageData.VPE_EltexMeteor.root.nodes.6.name: timeoutTicks
Others have mined the Eltex meteor. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.
